/* getCmGroupCodeList */
SELECT CCG.*, CCG.CM_GROUP_CODE AS CM_GROUP_CODE_TEXT FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_COM_GROUP_CODE CCG WHERE 1=1
AND CCG.CM_GROUP_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cmGroupCode},'%')
AND CCG.CM_GROUP_CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{cmGroupCodeNm},'%')
GROUP BY CCG.CM_GROUP_CODE
ORDER BY CM_GROUP_CODE ASC
